headline: A Continent Away, Trying to Remain Above It All
abstract: President Trump made his first appearance on the international stage since the House sent impeachment articles to the Senate, on the day his trial is set to begin in earnest.
lead_paragraph: DAVOS, Switzerland â€” President Trump swept into this moneyed Alpine village on Tuesday, full of brio and flattery, schmoozing with global business leaders as if there were no talk of removing him from office and no impeachment trial unfolding 4,000 miles away in Washington.
keywords: Trump-Ukraine Whistle-blower Complaint and Impeachment Inquiry
